â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ even travel in time between seasons, changing the environment to        â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ advance the gameplay-driven story -indeed, the mechanics are directly   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ related to who the protagonist is, what has happened to him and         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ everything he is doing: a man trapped in his own mind, he must use      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ all the tools at his disposition to escape to reality. Accompanied by   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ the snarky yet heartfelt narration of this comatose patient, the        â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
